subject: College Athletics

organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The A.C.C.’s formal introduction of Syracuse and Pittsburgh as its newest members left officials from Connecticut and Rutgers not-so-quietly searching for a new home.
